name: The Legendary Defense of Rivenstar
blurb: The Legendary Defense of Rivenstar is an Action RPG & Full RTS PC game set in a new high fantasy world developed by Fyurien Studios.

rewards.reward: IT HAS BEGUN - The Legendary Defense of Rivenstar has started!  Thank you for your support!  Everyone at Fyurien studios is very grateful not only for your support but for your confidence in us.  Every contribution is a step towards completing our quest and making our game a reality.   REWARD - "Premiere access to new media, news and updates before anyone else.  You will have access to a special part of our website where you get early access to anything we do."

HERO OF RIVENSTAR REWARD - "A Legendary Defense of RivenStar VECTOR STICKER.  A high quality, glossy plastic transparent sticker that you can proudly display anywhere you'd like. And of course everything from the pervious reward tier"

***EARLYBIRD*** APPRENTICE OF RIVENSTAR REWARD - A DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF THE GAME. Along with that we are offering a unique and mysterious IN-GAME ITEM. Worry not, it won't give you or anyone else an unfair advantage. But we promise you'll love it. And of course everything from the pervious reward tier.  No cost for shipping!

ADVENTURER OF RIVENSTAR REWARD - A DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF THE GAME.   Along with that we are offering a unique and mysterious IN-GAME ITEM.   Worry not, it won't give you or anyone else an unfair advantage.  But we promise you'll love it. And of course everything from the pervious reward tier

SQUIRE OF RIVENSTAR REWARD - A DIGITAL COLLECTORS BOOK featuring stories, the making of the game and other very cool stuff.  Also a DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK OF THE GAME featuring 2 CD's encompassing over 40 tracks of sometimes epic, other times dramatic game music.  Additionally, you will get a DIGITAL STRATEGY GUIDE AND A GAME ALMANAC to help guide you thru the game.  And finally, your name will go up in THE HALL OF HONOR inside the game for all to see. And of course everything from the pervious reward tier

***EARLYBIRD*** ELEMENTAL MAGE OF RIVENSTAR REWARD - 2x DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF THE GAME. Also a personalized THANK YOU NOTE from and signed by everyone at Fyurien Studios. As well as a DIGITAL ARTBOOK by our very own Carmen Alexe. And finally, the big one, A BETA KEY which will of course give you exclusive access to the beta of the game. And of course everything from the pervious reward tier

ROYAL KNIGHT OF RIVENSTAR REWARD - "Everything from previous reward tier, and a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD COPY OF "RIVENSTAR", a novel by R.W.C our very own ghost writer.  It tells the story of the first age and the falling of the Rivenstar into darkness.   Finally, you get a BOXED VERSION OF THE GAME along with the digital download.  Keep one and give one to a friend. And of course everything from the pervious reward tier

ELEMENTAL MAGE OF RIVENSTAR REWARD - 2x DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF THE GAME.  Also a personalized THANK YOU NOTE from and signed by everyone at Fyurien Studios.  As well as a DIGITAL ARTBOOK by our very own Carmen Alexe.  And finally, the big one, A BETA KEY which will of course give you exclusive access to the beta of the game. And of course everything from the pervious reward tier

HIGHLAND RANGER OF RIVENSTAR REWARD - "Everything from previous reward tier, and an extremely cool THE LEGENDARY DEFENSE OF RIVENSTAR T-SHIRT.  It may or may not poses magical properties that under combat situations may provide you with +10 Armor and +15 Fire Resistance.    Also, you get a very original and very unique signed art by of course our lovely Carmen Alexe. And of course everything from the pervious reward tier

DARK PALADIN OF RIVENSTAR REWARD - An OFFICIAL RIVENSTAR MOUSE PAD.  Along with that you a high quality CLOTH MAP that may or may not give away the locations of very cool loot and hidden treasure.  And finally a full size high detail SIGNED MAP.   Truth be told, if you pledge at this level, you'll know all of the secret locations in Rivenstar.  It's almost unfair to be honest. And of course everything from the pervious reward tier

SHADOW ASSASSIN OF RIVENSTAR REWARD - Your name in the credits with A GOLD THANK YOU for everyone to see.   Also, you get an exclusive and very limited COLLECTORS EDITION OF THE GAME which will include a Large Poster, a Small Statuette of a Colossus at Arms and a number of other very cool things.  This is a surprise we're sure you'll love. And of course everything from the pervious reward tier

HIGH TEMPLAR OF RIVENSTAR REWARD - "Everything from previous reward tier, and A CUSTOM CREATED PIECE OF ART by once again our very own Carmen Alexe.  She will work with you to find out what you'd like to have created and make it so.  Anything you can image she can draw and paint.  And the very special SIGNED COLLECTORS BOOK.  It represents the epitome of everything concerning Rivenstar and a must have for anyone who is a true fan of the game.  Ohh and 4x Total DIGITAL GAME DOWNLOAD. And of course everything from the pervious reward tier

DRAGONKIN OF RIVENSTAR REWARD - You are given full artistic control to DESIGN YOUR VERY OWN NON PLAYER CHARACTER (NPC).  He, or she, or it, can be of any race, class or character.  You can make them good or evil.  Work with our design team to find out exactly what you want your NPC to become.   Once done, you can also work with us to DESIGN A TRULY UNIQUE WEAPON that will become an integral part of the game.  You set the design and the specifications.  Make it all powerful, or give it unique properties.  Singing sword anyone?  And one more thing 6x Total DIGITAL GAME DOWNLOAD. And of course everything from the pervious reward tier

LORD OF THE REALM REWARD - "Everything from previous reward tier, and 8X Total DIGITAL GAME DOWNLOAD and the very cool option to DESIGN AND NAME A TAVERN AFTER YOU. We will help you build the tavern in whatever style you like, add unique NPC's of your choosing with unique backstories.  Place it in a prominent town and make it a center of quests and other functions.  You and your tavern will be well known across the land.  Mostly by drunk locals, but hey its a start. And of course everything from the pervious reward tier

HIGH CHANCELLOR OF RIVENSTAR REWARD - "Everything from previous reward tier, and probably the single coolest thing in any game.  YOU ARE IN THE GAME!  We talk to you, get to know you.  Our modeling team will make your likeness from facial features to physical.  We can even make any modifications you.  Give you a beard, or make you just smidge taller?  We can do that.  We round things off by giving you proper attire and of course unique power and abilities.  Ohh did we mention we'll give you a secret code you can use to unlock your character and play with him?  How cool is that?  Ohh right, 10x Total DIGITAL GAME DOWNLOAD, almost forgot. And of course everything from the pervious reward tier.

YOUNG PRINCE OF RIVENSTAR - The king is old, his time is soon passed.  A new king, a younger king must take the throne and restore Rivenstar.  Many that live choose their own fate, but not you.  You it seems fate has chosen to be the next ruler of Rivenstar.  You are a young prince, but in your veins runs the blood of royalty, the strength and courage of throne and the willpower unlike anyone else.  Step into the light young prince.\r\n\r\nREWARD - "Everything from previous reward tier, and the single coolest pledge reward ever given on Kickstarter.  If you are willing to pledge so much to help us make this game a reality, you deserve a truly amazing reward.  We would like to offer you LIFETIME COPIES OF ANY GAMES FYURIEN STUDIOS MAKES.  Should we make TLDoR 2, you get a copy.   You are in this with us for the long haul and we appreciate your support more than you can image it.

OLD KING OF RIVENSTAR - We kneel before you o beloved king.  All of Rivenstar kneels before you.   Statues that touch the heavens will be built in your honor and everyone shall know your name.   You have in your glory rebuilt Rivenstar and in doing so sacrificed everything for the good of the world.  No greater a burden is there than that placed upon your shoulders.  You alone carry the fate of Rivenstar.  Stray but a little and into darkness the world falls once more.   But you will not stray, you will not falter.  You are the Old King and with you the Light of the Rivenstar will shine again.  Long live the Old King!\r\n\r\nREWARD - "Everything from previous reward tier.  We've come to it at last.  Should you be the sort so generous and kingly to offer us such a wonderful pledge, then we should, without sparing expense, treat you like a king.  VISIT US, in Southern California and come to our studios.   Come have a visit with us, hang out at the beach, head over to Los Angeles, San Diego and San Francisco.  Let us show you Hollywood and all the other amazing sites in SoCal.  You are now the Old King of Rivenstar.
